org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game

Class MemorylessStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game.MemorylessStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Strategy<java.lang.Void>

    public class MemorylessStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements Strategy<java.lang.Void>
    This class provides an implementation of a memoryless strategy for a game player.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
